mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_login_log ( user_id, login_time, logout_time, login_ip, login_device, login_status, logout_type, create_pin, create_time, update_pin, update_time, is_delete ) VALUES ( #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{loginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{logoutTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{loginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginDevice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{logoutType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createPin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatePin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user_login_log WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND is_delete = 0
SELECT * FROM user_login_log WHERE user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND is_delete = 0
SELECT * FROM user_login_log WHERE login_status = #{loginStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND is_delete = 0
